text: A former #SmallBusiness owner & mayor, I understand the key to job creation/unlocking economic prosperity in local communities is investment in small, private businesses. I'm proud to have voted for the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct which created the #OpportunityZones development program.

html: If you make a long-term investment in one of these #OpportunityZones, you defer your capital gains tax for up to 10 yrs, which gives investors an incentive to help rebuild our communities.
